I'm interested in trying to coordinate several different crawlers
running heritrix.  I'm worried that the crawls will overlap even if I
don't have the same seed files on each machine.

Any suggestions on the right way to partition crawls among multiple
heritrix crawlers?

  Thankx,
  Lou
